channel.title: king solomons mines
channel.itunes:author: www.botar.us
channel.description: king solomons mines by henry rider haggard
channel.itunes:subtitle: king solomons mines by henry rider haggard
channel.itunes:summary: King Solomons Mines, first published in 1885, was a best-selling novel by the Victorian adventure writer H. Rider Haggard. It relates a journey into the heart of Africa by a group of adventurers led by Allan Quatermain in search of the legendary wealth said to be concealed in the mines of the novels title. It is significant as the first fictional adventure novel set in Africa, and is considered the genesis of the Lost World literary genre. - Haggard wrote over 50 books, among which were 14 novels starring Allan Quatermain.
channel.itunes:keywords: Drama, Adventure, Audio Theater, king solomons mines, H. rider haggard, botar

It relates a journey into the heart of Africa by a group of adventurers led by Allan Quatermain in search of the legendary wealth said to be concealed in the mines of the novels title. It is significant as the first fictional adventure novel set in Africa, and is considered the genesis of the Lost World literary genre. - Haggard wrote over 50 books, among which were 14 novels starring Allan Quatermain.
